title: Research Audiologist / Hearing Scientist
description: The Health and Wellbeing Team at Meta is seeking a Research Audiologist/Hearing Scientist who will report to the Director of Health and Wellbeing Research and work alongside other members of the Health and Wellbeing team, aiming to improve health outcomes throughout the world. We seek someone with a drive to improve the lives of people with hearing impairments and a passion for innovation. This is an opportunity for an expert in hearing science/audiology to contribute through their research expertise to the developing Health and Wellness program at Meta. The ideal candidate can manage technical and scientific research related to audiology and hearing science.
salary: US$177,000/year to US$251,000/year + bonus + equity + benefits
key_qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, relevant technical field, or equivalent practical experience. AuD, PhD, or Masters in Audiology/Hearing Sciences, or related field. 10+ years experience in relevant audiology/hearing science research.
preferred_qualifications: Research experience in hearing aids at a University, Research Center or Manufacturer. Product development experience for a hearing aid manufacturer and/or managed clinical studies for a medical device company.
responsibilities: Domain expert for audiology/hearing science research, collaborating with other clinical research scientists, clinical operations, and biostatisticians. Develop research study protocols and oversee study execution, for both internal and external studies with research organizations and vendors.
